message: type Stream in package scala is deprecated (since 2.13.0): Use LazyList instead of Stream
method + in class Int is deprecated (since 2.13.0): Adding a number and a String is deprecated. Use the string interpolation `s"$num$str"`
method mapValues in trait MapOps is deprecated (since 2.13.0): Use .view.mapValues(f). A future version will include a strict version of this method (for now, .view.mapValues(f).toMap).

position.lineContent: def x2[X1, X2](m: Map[X1, X2]) = m.mapValues(a => a)
